animeTitle: Urusei Yatsura Movie 4: Lum The Forever
animeDescription: Strange things begin happening in Tomobiki Town... When a great cherry tree, "Tarozakura" is cut down while Lum & Co. are making a movie, Lum loses her horns-and her powers! Thus begins the strangest and most lyrical of the Urusei Yatsura movies...(Source: AniDB)
